Title: Expands coverage for developmentally disabled persons past twenty-six years of age
Summary: Expands coverage for developmentally disabled persons past twenty-six years of age; prohibits insurance companies from wrongfully terminating contracts of developmentally disabled persons; requires recertification of such developmentally disabled person's condition once every five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring health insurance contracts provide coverage to developmentally disabled persons beyond twenty-six years of age
